name: Mushroom Mayhem (KeeganWL, MatthewRatzell69)
description:
Preface:

This game was made by Keegan Lebeau and Matthew Ratzell in 48 hours for the RIT Game Developers Club Halloween 2022 Game Jam. While we plan on continuing development on this game in the future this is by no means a finished product. All assets were produced in photoshop; while Unity 2021.2.7f1 was used as the game engine.

Controls:
  • Select a troop from the bottom of the screen, and click on an open white spot to place an enemy.
Important Mechanics:
  • Mushrooms passively release spores that will damage your towers. 
  • Mushrooms also drop their spores when they die. The closer the spores are to a troop, the more damage they will inflict on the troop.
Troop Types + Utilities:
  • Skeleton(Troop) - Short-range, low-damage troop who hurls its bones at the invading mushrooms. 
  • Ghost(Troop) - Short-range, very low-damage troop capable of manifesting energy capable of slowing the invading mushrooms.
  • Dracula(Troop) - Long-Range, a very high-damage troop who picks the mushrooms from a distance.
  • Spider(Troop) -Medium-Range, medium-damage troop who spins webs at incredible speeds.
  • Jack O Lantern(Utility) - Single-use utility that detonates shortly after being lit
  • Potion(Utility) - Single-use utility that produces anti-spores for a short time after being broken.
